title: Single-page AI ebook sales landing page (WhatsApp CTA)

requirements.summary: Replace the existing Cake King single-page layout with a 6-section single-page ebook sales landing page in the exact required order and headings.
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage renders exactly 6 sections in the order specified: Hero, Product Preview, Why Choose This Guide, Social Proof/Reviews, Final CTA, Footer
All user-facing text is in English and matches the user-provided headings/subheadings/reviews/disclaimer verbatim (except where the user left wording open-ended)

file_operations.description: Replace the current Cake King section composition with the required 6-section landing page composition and wire all new section components in the exact order (Hero, Product Preview, Why Choose This Guide, Social Proof/Reviews, Final CTA, Footer).

Create the landing page Hero section component matching the required heading/subheading/CTA and new tech-style visuals. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the Product Preview section component showing the ebook image, exact price string, description, and WhatsApp CTA. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for layout and CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the “Why Choose This Guide?” section component with the exact title and the five user-provided bullet points, formatted for mobile readability.

Create the Social Proof / Reviews section component that renders exactly three review strings verbatim (including the star symbol). Use shadcn-ui Card for clean review presentation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the Final CTA section component with the required big headline, subtext, and WhatsApp CTA button. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Replace the existing bakery footer content with the required disclaimer text and WhatsApp number display for the ebook landing page.

requirements.summary: Implement the Hero section with prominent ebook cover, exact heading/subheading, and a WhatsApp CTA opening the provided link in a new tab/window.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero CTA button opens exactly: https://wa.me/919279282274?text=Hi%20I%20want%20to%20buy%20the%20AI%20ebook
The ebook cover is visually prominent on mobile and desktop (no tiny thumbnail presentation)

file_operations.description: Implement the Hero UI: large professional ebook cover image, exact main heading “Earn Your First ₹10,000 with the Help of AI”, exact subheading “Beginner-friendly • No Coding • Real Methods”, and a highlighted CTA button labeled “Contact on WhatsApp to Buy” that opens the shared WhatsApp link in a new tab/window. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a single exported constant for the canonical WhatsApp click link to be reused by all CTAs to ensure consistency across sections.

requirements.summary: Implement the Product Preview section with ebook image (smaller), exact price string, description line, and WhatsApp CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: The Product Preview section shows the price string exactly: “₹199 Only”
The Product Preview CTA opens exactly the provided WhatsApp link

file_operations.description: Implement Product Preview content and layout: show ebook image again at smaller size, display price exactly “₹199 Only”, show description exactly “Learn simple, practical AI methods to start earning online from zero.”, and add a CTA button labeled “Buy Now on WhatsApp” opening the shared WhatsApp link. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement the “Why Choose This Guide?” section with the exact title and the five user-provided bullet points.
acceptanceCriteria: The section heading is exactly: “Why Choose This Guide?”
All five bullets are present and readable on mobile without overcrowding

file_operations.description: Render the section heading exactly “Why Choose This Guide?” and include all five user-provided bullet points verbatim, using a mobile-first list layout with comfortable spacing and line-height.

requirements.summary: Implement the Social Proof / Reviews section with exactly 3 short reviews matching the provided text verbatim.
acceptanceCriteria: Exactly three reviews are displayed
The review strings match the user-provided text verbatim

file_operations.description: Render exactly three reviews with the exact user-provided strings (including the star symbol), and ensure no additional reviews or testimonial UI is shown. Use shadcn-ui Card for each review; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement the Final CTA section with exact headline/subtext and WhatsApp CTA button linking to the provided WhatsApp click link.
acceptanceCriteria: Final CTA button opens exactly the provided WhatsApp link
Final CTA section is visually distinct from prior sections and clearly acts as the last conversion push

file_operations.description: Implement Final CTA content: big bold text “Start Your AI Journey Today”, subtext “Limited price: ₹199”, and CTA button labeled “Contact on WhatsApp Now” opening the shared WhatsApp link. Use shadcn-ui Button and distinct section styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace the footer content with the required disclaimer and WhatsApp number display.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows the disclaimer sentence verbatim
Footer shows WhatsApp number verbatim: “+91 9279282274”

file_operations.description: Replace footer contents with: disclaimer text exactly “Results depend on effort and consistency. This is a beginner-friendly guide, not a get-rich-quick scheme.” and show WhatsApp number exactly “+91 9279282274”, removing all Cake King branding/attribution content.

requirements.summary: Ensure all WhatsApp CTAs use the exact same WhatsApp click link and remove/replace any existing Cake King WhatsApp message text.
acceptanceCriteria: No button/link in the UI opens a WhatsApp URL containing “Hello%20Cake%20King”
All WhatsApp CTAs open exactly: https://wa.me/919279282274?text=Hi%20I%20want%20to%20buy%20the%20AI%20ebook

file_operations.description: Define/export the single canonical WhatsApp click link constant exactly as provided and ensure it is the only WhatsApp URL used by landing page CTAs.
Update the Hero CTA to use the shared canonical WhatsApp link constant and remove any legacy Cake King message/link usage.
Update the Product Preview CTA to use the shared canonical WhatsApp link constant and ensure it opens in a new tab/window.
Update the Final CTA button to use the shared canonical WhatsApp link constant and ensure it opens in a new tab/window.
Remove the old Cake King Hero component that contains the legacy WhatsApp message/link with “Hello%20Cake%20King”.
Remove the old Cake King Contact component to eliminate legacy WhatsApp CTA text and avoid unused/orphaned bakery content.
Remove the old Cake King Services component so the landing page only contains the required 6 sections and no bakery content.
Remove the old Cake King Gallery component so the landing page only contains the required 6 sections and no bakery content.

requirements.summary: Update styling to a clean, modern, professional tech-style look using a blue/green/white palette with mobile-first responsive conversion-focused layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary/CTA styling uses a consistent blue/green/white theme across all sections
All sections render cleanly on small screens without horizontal scrolling
Typography is legible (no overly light text on light backgrounds and no cramped line heights)

file_operations.description: Replace the warm bakery-themed CSS variables with a tech-style blue/green/white palette for light and dark modes, keeping typography readable and spacing comfortable across sections.

Apply conversion-focused tech styling: clear section separation, legible typography, responsive spacing, and a prominent CTA button aligned with the blue/green theme. Use shadcn-ui Button styling conventions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply tech-style section styling and responsive layout so price/description/CTA are scannable and conversion-focused on mobile. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button styling conventions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply tech-style section styling and responsive list spacing so bullets remain readable on small screens without overcrowding.

Apply tech-style section styling with clean review cards and clear separation from adjacent sections. Use shadcn-ui Card styling conventions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Make the Final CTA visually distinct (strong contrast, spacing, and CTA prominence) while maintaining the consistent blue/green/white theme. Use shadcn-ui Button styling conventions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update footer styling to match the tech-style theme while keeping disclaimer and WhatsApp number legible and accessible on mobile.

No backend endpoints are added/used to fetch images

Add the required generated image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-tech-bg.dim_1920x1080.jpg for use as the Hero background.
